title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reinvent your career: From developer to cloud leader (DEV101)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 重塑你的职业生涯：从开发者到云领导者 (DEV101)
abstract: Cloud careers evolve quickly. This session explores how developers can grow into cloud leadership roles, sharing practical strategies for building influence, technical expertise, and resilience along the way. Attendees gain insight into how to navigate career growth while staying grounded in engineering best practices.
abstract_cn: 云职业发展迅速。本次会议探讨开发人员如何成长为云领导角色，分享建立影响力、技术专长和韧性的实用策略。与会者将深入了解如何在保持工程最佳实践的同时实现职业成长。
